page.title: 07HOUSES FOR SALE
page.content: These houses were offered in July '85. a) ASHWELL HOUSE: Â£200,000 Large entrance hall; cloakroom; drawing room; library; dining room; kitchen; breakfast room; utility room; 6 bedrooms; 2 bathrms; seperate W.C.; 3 garages; over 1 acre gardens. B) Period cottage Â£85,000. Hall; cloakrooms; sitting room; dining room kitchen;4 bedrooms; bathroom; garage; cottage garden. C) Bungalow. Hall; sitting room; dining room; kitchen; 2 bedrooms; bathroom; garage; good garden. These represent the{high,middle and {low end of the private housing}in Ashwell according to the village estate agent.
